member.name: T:openABAP.Compiler.Class
member.summary: the abap class command is used to store data declarations and method declarations.
member.exception: Is thrown when the compiler error.

member.name: M:openABAP.Compiler.Class.AddMethod(openABAP.Compiler.Method)
member.summary: add a method-defintion to the class.
member.exception: Is thrown when the method already exists in the class.

member.name: M:openABAP.Compiler.Class.GetMethod(System.String)
member.summary: get method defintion by method name.
member.exception: Is thrown when no method with this name is declared for the class.

member.name: M:openABAP.Compiler.Class.AddAttribute(openABAP.Compiler.Data)
member.summary: Adds the attribute, which means a data declaration.
member.exception: Is thrown when an attribute with same name is already defined.

member.name: M:openABAP.Compiler.Class.GetAttribute(System.String)
member.summary: Get an attribute (a data) by name.
member.exception: Is thrown when no attribute with given name is defined in class.

member.name: T:openABAP.Compiler.ClassList
member.summary: list of classes sorted by name. quick access to a class by binary tree search algorithm.

member.name: T:openABAP.Compiler.Command
member.summary: Command. abstract basis class of all abap-commands

member.name: T:openABAP.Compiler.CommandList
member.summary: container for commands used in methods to store all commands.

member.name: T:openABAP.Compiler.Compiler
member.summary: central class of openABAP implementing following feauture: scanning and parsing the abap source file. creating an internal representation of the program using class. building the CIL file assembling the CIL file to EXE-assembly file. calling EXE-file
